text: Meganola is a genus of moths of the family Nolidae. The genus was erected by Harrison Gray Dyar Jr. in 1898. It is sometimes considered a synonym of Roeselia. ==Species== * Meganola albula (Denis & Schiffermüller, 1775) * Meganola alteroscota Toulgoët, 1982 * Meganola apiensis Holloway, 2003 * Meganola
